articles.title: NHL player Colby Cave dies at 25 after suffering brain bleed
articles.description: Cave was placed into a medically induced coma after being airlifted Tuesday to a Toronto hospital, where he underwent emergency surgery to remove a colloid cyst, NBC Sports reports.
articles.content:
Colby Cave, a forward for the NHL's Edmonton Oilers, is dead at age 25 after suffering a brain bleed, NBC Sports reports.
